avalancheActivity.comment:
In all aspects medium-sized and, in isolated cases, large avalanches are possible. The avalanche prone locations are to be found in particular at the base of rock walls and behind abrupt changes in the terrain and adjacent to ridgelines and in gullies and bowls. In addition the wind slabs must be taken into account.
As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of wet avalanches being released will increase gradually in all regions. Snow slides and natural avalanches are still possible. This applies in particular in steep rocky terrain.
Avalanches can as before be released, in particular by large loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs and wet snow represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: In its middle, the snowpack is fairly homogeneous and its surface has a melt-freeze crust that is strong in many cases. In steep terrain there is a danger of falling on the hard crust. The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to increasing softening of the snowpack. This applies in particular on sunny slopes. In some places wind slabs are lying on a hard crust. In addition large wind slabs formed also adjacent to ridgelines.

tendency.comment: The weather will be cloudy over a wide area. Light precipitation.

avalancheActivity.comment: As a consequence of warming during the day, the likelihood of wet avalanches being released will increase gradually in all regions. In all aspects small and medium-sized avalanches are possible. Gliding avalanches are possible. Avalanches can as before be released, in particular by large loads.
avalancheActivity.highlights: Wind slabs and wet snow represent the main danger.

snowpackStructure.comment: The weather conditions as the day progresses will give rise to increasing softening of the snowpack over a wide area.

tendency.comment: The weather will be cloudy over a wide area. Light precipitation.
